Name: Name
Selecting all nodes will discover for av: Selecting all nodes will discover for available disks storage on all nodes.
Selecting nodes allows you to limit the: Selecting nodes allows you to limit the discovery for available disks to specific nodes.
Allows you to discover the available dis: Allows you to discover the available disks on all available nodes
Selecting all nodes will use the availab: Selecting all nodes will use the available disks that match the selected filters only on selected nodes.
Disk limit will set the maximum number o: Disk limit will set the maximum number of PVs to create on a node. If the field is empty will create PVs for all available disks on the matching nodes.
A Local Volume Set allows you to filter: A Local Volume Set allows you to filter a set of storage volumes group them and create a dedicated storage class to consume storage for them.
Select nodes for creating volume filter: Select nodes for creating volume filter
